name: Robbers Car - Cops Pursuit
description:
Escape from the cops in this high speed chase game!
Cops have fast cars, trucks, pick ups, and military cars, but you have super sports cars, so be faster!

Drive and drift by tapping the screen.

◉ Lot of fast vehicles
◉ Leaderboards
◉ Amazing music and graphics

Download it now! Challenge your friends and have fun!
